## Commands

The following slash commands are available for development:

- `/spp.constitution` - Create or update project governing principles and development guidelines
- `/spp.specify` - Define what you want to build (requirements and user stories)
- `/spp.plan` - Create technical implementation plans with your chosen tech stack
- `/spp.tasks` - Generate actionable task lists for implementation
- `/spp.implement` - Execute all tasks to build the feature according to the plan
- `/spp.clarify` - Clarify underspecified areas (recommended before `/spp.plan`)
- `/spp.analyze` - Cross-artifact consistency & coverage analysis
- `/spp.checklist` - Generate custom quality checklists
- `/spp.readme` - Generate or update README.md file with project documentation
- `/spp.git_commit` - Create a git commit with an optimized commit message following conventional commit standards
- `/spp.git_push` - Push current branch to remote repository with appropriate flags
- `/spp.debug` - Analyze and debug code issues, errors, or unexpected behavior
